type.description: The type of sales order to get

orderId.description: The id of the sales order to get

$block: The Visma.net.ERP.SalesOrders.Api.Dto.SalesOrder.SalesOrderTaxDto specifies a tax line detail for a sales order

$ul: **exemptTax**: Indicates if the taxable amount will be included in taxExemptTotal
**includeInTaxable**: Indicates if the taxable amount will be included in taxableTotal
**isPendingTax**: Indicates if the tax calculated is treated as a pending tax
**isReverseTax**: Indicates if the tax is treated as a reverse tax
**isStatisticalTax**: Indicates if the tax calculated is treated as a statistical tax
**taxAmount**: The calculated tax amount for the specific tax
**taxId**: The unique tax identifier of the specific tax applied to the document
**taxRate**: The tax rate used for the tax
**taxType**: The type of tax, which can be Sales, Use, VAT or Withholding
**taxableAmount**: The calculated taxable amount for the specific tax
